meanings.sent1: She looked vexedly at the tangled wires, unsure how to fix them.
meanings.sent2: He sighed vexedly as he tried to untangle the knot in his shoelaces.
meanings.sent3: The cat stared vexedly at the laser pointer, unable to catch the elusive red dot.
meanings.sent4: The old clock ticked vexedly, its hands refusing to move smoothly.
meanings.sent5: The child pouted vexedly when he couldn't reach the cookie jar on the high shelf.

meanings.sent1: She stomped vexedly out of the room after the argument.
meanings.sent2: The customer complained vexedly about the slow service at the restaurant.
meanings.sent3: The dog barked vexedly at the mailman, protecting its territory.
meanings.sent4: The storm clouds gathered vexedly, ready to unleash their fury.
meanings.sent5: The teacher glared vexedly at the students talking during the test.
